Public transport in the area is organized by
, except for Habo and Mullsjö which are served by

. Falköping, Habo, Mullsjö and Skövde have direct Västtrafik trains from Gothenburg. Hjo, Tibro and Tidaholm have buses from Skövde. Falköping station is almost 2 km from city centre, so a bus can be used. Search the sites for connections.

From the Landvetter and Gothenburg City airports, the airport bus to Gothenburg (going directly from the airport building) and then train is preferred.

Tickets for Västtrafik can be bought by credit card onboard, but not for buses in Gothenburg. Pressbyrån (e.g. at Landvetter airport) and some other shops sell tickets (not at City Airport). The airport bus need special tickets which are bought with credit card onboard. Read the

Inside the municipalities there are buses. All are organized by Västtrafik or Jönköpings Länstrafik.
The city and village centres are small so walking might be a good option. Skövde is a little larger.
